name: Project Blueberry
description:
Controls : 
WASD - Movement
Mouse Input - Turn Camera
R - Instant Respawn
Control (Hold) - Downwards Dash
Control (Tap) - Downwards Dash + Ground Bounce
Shift + Any WASD - Dash

How to play :
-Download the zip and launch the file named Blueberry.exe
-Use the controls above to navigate through each level and collect as many triangles as possible.
-Complete a level by getting to the end goal.

Known Bugs :

-For some reason sometimes a random menu option will change to a random value (sensitivity, audio volume sliders).
-Wall jumps will send you straight outwards instead of outwards and with your current velocity.
-Finishing level 2 will softlock you, that's meant to happen.
-Ranking systems are not accurate, the rank you'll receive per level will not match your results.
-Mouse won't auto hide on level start (hotfix: quickly load and de-load menu)
